text: Robin Ren√© Roberts (born November 23, 1960) is an American television news reporter. She reports on Good Morning America from the ABC News. She became the co-anchor in 2005. Roberts also worked for ESPN for 15 years. She was inducted into the Women's Basketball Hall of Fame in 2012. Roberts was born in Tuskegee, Alabama. == Personal life == In 2007, Roberts said she had breast cancer. On 2012, she said that she had a bone marrow disease called myelodysplastic syndrome. She left Good Morning America for a while to get bone marrow transplants and returned on February 20, 2013. In December 2013, Roberts announced she was a lesbian.
